name: Katherine Breed
profile:
I like to share scenes/clips I think are cool, mainly of Doctor Who but also other bits and pieces. Currently a checkout operator doing this as a hobby but am trying to improve my video editing skills and branch out more by putting different things together. Would love to do video editing as a full time job though :).

Started a review channel KTMG Reviews which you can view here - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_D3cFOwz7K76rdkvPzvdnQ (2018 so still in early stages as of this writing)
